website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Driftium has received mixed reviews from its users. This road running shoe has impressed runners because of its accurate fit, affordable price, and comfortable details. Although some wearers have found structural issues such as durability and cushioning, the Reebok Driftium remains to be a great buy for the majority as they claim they would repurchase the shoe.
pros: Majority of users describe the Reebok Driftium as a comfortable shoe
Others claim it does not require a break-in period
Many runners are impressed with the precise fit that the shoe has provided
The Reebok Driftium has terrific flexibility, according to some wearers
A number of buyers agree that the Driftium is affordable
The upper of the shoe is breathable, one user has mentioned
The in-shoe room remains adequate even when a thick sock is worn, according to a reviewer
cons: A few users doubt the durability of the upper as they had experienced the mesh either tear up or wear a hole through itself
A couple of runners had observed the Driftium’s lack of cushioning as they had to put in extra insoles for padding
Some buyers dislike that the Driftium has limited width options
One wearer claims that running in the Reebok Driftium has made their hip muscles sore

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe at a good price. True to size.
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday running/walking shoe! This is a very good shoe if you run several miles a day (I run 3-5 and really like them), but probably not the best for long distance competitors. Fairly good arch support, great looking and true to size! This is a good shoe at a good price point. Definitely recommend this shoe to other casual runners and everyday walkers.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great running shoe. I have used it f/ about 20 miles so far. To me it’s a light shoe and so took some getting used to but after I used it a couple of times they feel just right. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have been great, I have had some pains in my arches from past shoes from Payless, but these ones have been great and have helped relieve the pain in my arches. I would recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: @Andy_doug

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but Short Lived
customer_reviews.text: It was moderately comfortable and light on my feet. However, the cloth started tearing up slightly and I didn't even take it on a hike or anything. I'd say it's a good shoe to keep for maybe 6 months of moderate use and then it won't feel/look the same anymore!
customer_reviews.author: s3xyteslaguy

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable walking/running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. VERY comfortable walking/running shoe. The Yellow Neon is a little bit brighter than the pictures portray, but Overall, amazing quality and design for the price! I love Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap shoes
customer_reviews.text: These don't fit quite right and the rubber and fabric in the front of the shoe separated after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Son is happy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my size 11.... 20 year old son. He likes them and was happy to receive them as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Keener

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are great! My 11 year old son loves them. If it was up to him, he would pick these over any other shoes he has to wear.
customer_reviews.author: PDudish

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery, great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant color, perfect fit (thank you, Reebok) and arrived before I expected it. Top-notch product and transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: the front that covers the toes has ripped u can see my socks ....i realy like them at first .i have only worn them a couple hours a day after work and on vacation ...i have had them for 2 months
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, very comfortable! I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow but I usually wear an E width
customer_reviews.author: Maintenance tech

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. I am in the service industry and on my feet all day. They are comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of skimpy on the insoles
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of padding inside, had to add extra insoles. But the flexibility of the shoe, is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Kstar

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I like how cheap the product is. Great price for the product and a good work shoe since I work in retail.
customer_reviews.author: Jervy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price it has been the best shoe so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fits fine, but materials are very cheap
customer_reviews.text: the "leather" material on the sides have begun to de-laminate. you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cossey

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers, been wearing reebok over nike for a year or two now
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, but order a size larger than you normally would.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Reebok...overall...good sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: A lol bit bigger than a 12 at toe but overall good comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Cain

product_meta.title: Reebok mens CN2552 Driftium
product_meta.description: Whether you're going for a quick morning run or finally running your first 5K, the Reebok® Driftium Run sneaker gives you the support you need! Low-cut design for freedom of motion at the ankles. Breathable and lightweight mesh upper for air flow. Traditional lace-up closure. Heel tab for easy on and off. Padded tongue and collar. Molded textile sockliner. Generously padded footbed. High-abrasion rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 13 oz Product measurements were taken using size 13, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
